channel.title: Pages on POLS 501: Advanced Political Research Design and Analysis
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on POLS 501: Advanced Political Research Design and Analysis

item.title: Onboarding
item.description: Please complete the following before the first day of class. Sign up for our Slack channel. You should have received an invite. If not email the instructors. Sign up for a GitHub Fill out course survey using the course. The should have received an email with the link. A link is also posted on the Slack channel. Download R and RStudio Desktop (Open Source Edition). You should be able to use defaults for all settings.
